title: Iran Leader Ayatollah To Lead Funeral Prayers For Hamas Chief Ismail Haniyeh
content: Iran was set to hold funeral processions on Thursday for Hamas political chief Ismail Haniyeh ahead of his burial in Doha after he was killed in a strike in Tehran blamed on Israel.
summary: Iran was set to hold funeral processions on Thursday for Hamas political chief Ismail Haniyeh ahead of his burial in Doha after he was killed in a strike in Tehran blamed on Israel.

title: Kate Middleton Had Emergency Surgery To Remove Lump As A Teen, Says New Book
content: The surgery left a three-inch scar which several people noticed on Ms Middleton's first solo engagement over two decades ago.
summary: The surgery left a three-inch scar which several people noticed on Ms Middleton's first solo engagement over two decades ago.

title: How Undercover Agents Posed As Sex Buyers At Comic Con To Rescue Victims
content: Undercover officers posing as sex buyers at last week's Comic-Con event in California rescued human trafficking victims, including a 16-year-old girl, and made multiple arrests, prosecutors said Wednesday.
summary: Undercover officers posing as sex buyers at last week's Comic-Con event in California rescued human trafficking victims, including a 16-year-old girl, and made multiple arrests, prosecutors said Wednesday.

title: "If I Win, He Resigns. If He Wins...": Elon Musk Dares Venezuela President
content: Billionaire Elon Musk has accepted a challenge to fight Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro on national television. The SpaceX and Tesla chief, and the owner of the social network X, took to his platform to respond to Maduro's challenge.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk has accepted a challenge to fight Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro on national television. The SpaceX and Tesla chief, and the owner of the social network X, took to his platform to respond to Maduro's challenge.

title: 17-Year-Old Male Charged With Murder Of 3 Girls In UK Knife Attack
content: A 17-year-old male was charged on Thursday with the murder of three girls and the attempted murder of 10 more people in a knife attack at a Taylor Swift-themed dance class, UK prosecutors said.
summary: A 17-year-old male was charged on Thursday with the murder of three girls and the attempted murder of 10 more people in a knife attack at a Taylor Swift-themed dance class, UK prosecutors said.

title: North Korea Wants To Restart Nuclear Talks If Trump Wins, Says Ex-Diplomat
content: North Korea wants to reopen nuclear talks with the United States if Donald Trump is re-elected as president and is working to devise a new negotiating strategy, a senior North Korean diplomat who recently defected to South Korea told Reuters.
summary: North Korea wants to reopen nuclear talks with the United States if Donald Trump is re-elected as president and is working to devise a new negotiating strategy, a senior North Korean diplomat who recently defected to South Korea told Reuters.

title: US Says Plea Deal Reached With 9/11 Mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed
content: US prosecutors have reached a deal with 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed, the Pentagon said Wednesday, reportedly involving a guilty plea in exchange for avoiding a death penalty trial.
summary: US prosecutors have reached a deal with 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed, the Pentagon said Wednesday, reportedly involving a guilty plea in exchange for avoiding a death penalty trial.

title: Iran's Leader Orders Attack On Israel After Hamas Chief's Killing: Report
content: Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has ordered Iran to strike Israel directly, in retaliation for the killing of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran, New York Times reported, citing three Iranian officials, briefed on the order.
summary: Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has ordered Iran to strike Israel directly, in retaliation for the killing of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran, New York Times reported, citing three Iranian officials, briefed on the order.

title: Venezuela's Nicolas Maduro, Elon Musk Battle It Out Online
content: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, whose claim to victory at the polls has been widely contested, is no friend of billionaire Elon Musk, and the feeling is clearly mutual, with their war of words escalating amid the political crisis in Caracas.
summary: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, whose claim to victory at the polls has been widely contested, is no friend of billionaire Elon Musk, and the feeling is clearly mutual, with their war of words escalating amid the political crisis in Caracas.

title: US Expresses Concern Over Escalating Middle East Conflict Risk
content: The White House on Wednesday voiced concern about the increased risk of an escalation into a broader Middle East war after the assassination of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in Iran drew threats of retaliation against Israel.
summary: The White House on Wednesday voiced concern about the increased risk of an escalation into a broader Middle East war after the assassination of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in Iran drew threats of retaliation against Israel.

title: "Is She Indian Or Black?": Donald Trump On Kamala Harris
content: Donald Trump questioned Wednesday whether Democrat Kamala Harris is really Black or is using race as a political convenience in an interview that sent shockwaves through the 2024 presidential contest.
summary: Donald Trump questioned Wednesday whether Democrat Kamala Harris is really Black or is using race as a political convenience in an interview that sent shockwaves through the 2024 presidential contest.

title: UN Chief Calls Killing Of Hamas, Hezbollah Leaders "Dangerous Escalation"
content: Calling the twin strikes by Israel killing senior leaders of Hamas and Hezbollah during a 24-hour period a "dangerous escalation", UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres has called for an international diplomatic push to prevent the conflict.
summary: Calling the twin strikes by Israel killing senior leaders of Hamas and Hezbollah during a 24-hour period a "dangerous escalation", UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres has called for an international diplomatic push to prevent the conflict.

title: 2 Al Jazeera Journalists Killed In Israeli Strike On Gaza: Report
content: Two Al Jazeera journalists were killed on Wednesday in an Israeli strike in Gaza, the Qatar-based channel reported as war rages in the Palestinian territory between Israel and Hamas.
summary: Two Al Jazeera journalists were killed on Wednesday in an Israeli strike in Gaza, the Qatar-based channel reported as war rages in the Palestinian territory between Israel and Hamas.

title: Boeing Names Ex Aerospace Veteran Robert "Kelly" Ortberg As New CEO
content: Boeing on Wednesday named former aerospace veteran Robert "Kelly" Ortberg its next CEO, as the aviation giant reported a hefty loss on continued operational problems.
summary: Boeing on Wednesday named former aerospace veteran Robert "Kelly" Ortberg its next CEO, as the aviation giant reported a hefty loss on continued operational problems.

title: Top Hezbollah Commander's Body Recovered From Israeli Strike Rubble: Report
content: The body of top Hezbollah commander Fuad Shukr was recovered Wednesday from the rubble of an Israeli strike in south Beirut a source close to the group said, as fears mounted of a wider war.
summary: The body of top Hezbollah commander Fuad Shukr was recovered Wednesday from the rubble of an Israeli strike in south Beirut a source close to the group said, as fears mounted of a wider war.

title: First Case Of "Virgin Birth" In Italy, Female Sharks Make Babies: Report
content: Italian researchers have noted the first case of "virgin birth", or reproduction without fertilisation, in an endangered shark species, a scientific journal reported this week.
summary: Italian researchers have noted the first case of "virgin birth", or reproduction without fertilisation, in an endangered shark species, a scientific journal reported this week.

title: NASA Smacked A Spacecraft Into An Asteroid - What It Learnt
content: NASA's DART mission  Double Asteroid Redirection Test  was humanitys first real-world planetary defence mission.
summary: NASA's DART mission  Double Asteroid Redirection Test  was humanitys first real-world planetary defence mission.

title: Russia Begins 3rd Stage Of Non-Strategic Nuclear Exercises
content: The third stage of Russia's non-strategic nuclear exercises has begun, which focuses on the preparation of units for the combat use of non-strategic nuclear weapons, the Russian Ministry of Defense said on Wednesday on its Telegram channel.
summary: The third stage of Russia's non-strategic nuclear exercises has begun, which focuses on the preparation of units for the combat use of non-strategic nuclear weapons, the Russian Ministry of Defense said on Wednesday on its Telegram channel.

title: Jailed Kremlin Critic Vladimir Kara-Murza's Location "Unknown," Says Lawyer
content: Lawyers representing jailed Kremlin critic Vladimir Kara-Murza said Wednesday that they did not know the dissident's exact location after twice being denied access to the facility where he was supposed to be held.
summary: Lawyers representing jailed Kremlin critic Vladimir Kara-Murza said Wednesday that they did not know the dissident's exact location after twice being denied access to the facility where he was supposed to be held.

title: Slovakia's Bratislava Airport Evacuated After Bomb Threat: Report
content: Slovakia's Bratislava Airport was being evacuated due to a bomb alert, local police said on Wednesday.
summary: Slovakia's Bratislava Airport was being evacuated due to a bomb alert, local police said on Wednesday.
